availability.p: © Duke Databank of Documentary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.

revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - line 10: Yes, gamma is preferable to eta following rho. Σεργ̣ί̣[ο]υ is thus better than Σερή̣ρ̣ο̣υ̣. Line 18: good reading. I am willing to accept the proposal γραφὲ(ν) (καὶ) ἐπερ(ωτη)θ(εὶς), although I agree with Cowey that P.Oxy. 58.3933.13 is not an clear parallel. I've not been able to verify the symbol in SB 6.9589 due to problems with the website in Vienna.

Vote - AcceptText - lin10 Σεργ̣ί̣[ο]υ - the gamma is certainly better than an eta, which has a long high first vertical stroke. The iota descends quite markedly and more than sometimes, but cf. lin15 εἰς where in ligature the iota is indeed long. So, yes, I reckon the new reading is distinctly better and there is little that makes it unlikely. lin18 τετραξε(στιαῖα) the small alpha attached to the xi, which descends markedly, is clear. The raised epsilon is also quite clear. lin29 (καὶ) this is certainly comparable to SB VI 9589,16. P.Oxy. LVIII 3933,33 is not a good parallel as far as I can see. In the Oxy papyrus the καὶ is clearly visible in full, I think. Remove the rasied letter mark up throughout. Otherwise fine.

Z. 5, 7, 24, 30f., 35 und 36: Anpassungen an BL VI 70. Z. 4: Anpassung an BL VII 100. Z. 33f.: Anpassung an BL VIII 201. Z. 10: Σερή̣ρ̣ο̣υ̣ (l. Σεουήρου) → Σεργ̣ί̣[ο]υ (an der Abbildung im Internet). Z. 18: τετρ<α>ξε(στιαῖα) → τετραξε(στιαῖα) (an der Abbildung im Internet; das α ist klar vorhanden, vgl. das α von χρείαν in Z. 13 und σωτηρίαν in Z. 27). Z. 29: γραφέ(ν). ἐπερ(ωτη)θ(εὶς) → γραφὲ(ν) (καὶ) ἐπερ(ωτη)θ(εὶς) (an der Abbildung im Internet; ich halte den 2. Schrägstrich für ein Symbol für καί; vgl. z.B. P.Oxy. LVIII 3933,33 und SB VI 9589,16 mit den Abb.). Ferner kleinere Korrekturen in Z. 3, 9 (Akzente) und 30.
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
